original_text: Some Pharisees came to Jesus. They began to argue with him. They wanted to see him do something powerful. That would show them that God had really sent him.
korean_text: 바리새인들이 나와서 예수를 힐난하며 그를 시험하여 하늘로부터 오는 표적을 구하거늘

sentences.original_text: They began to argue with him.
They wanted to see him do something powerful.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 무언가 능력 있는 일을 하는 것을 보고 싶어했다.

sentences.original_text: that God had really sent him.
